participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and activities.
participant_1.background: I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends. I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion. I have not done anything since high school. Now I also work at a bank. I enjoy watching sci-fi movies because they are often thought-provoking and inspire me to think about the future.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and humorous, Jake has a laid-back approach to life and enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: My wife doesn't like me anymore, but at least I'm getting used to my new beard. I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it. I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal. I'm not a morning person, but I love going hiking with my friends. My favorite thing about my job is the free cupcakes.

content.text: Hi! I'm doing alright, how about you?
I'm doing great! I just got back from a weekend trip to the mountains.
That sounds awesome! I wish I could go hiking more often.
Maybe we can go hiking together sometime!
That would be fun! I love exploring new places with people.
Oh cool! What kind of music do you like?
I love listening to death metal.
I've never really listened to death metal before.
Oh, you should! It's really intense and exciting.
That's so cool! I've never tried archery before.
You should! It's really fun and it's a great way to stay in shape.
Awesome! Maybe we can go to an archery range together sometime.
